value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of top level StarCraft 2 between Dark (Zerg) and ByuN (Terran). In this series both players, but especially ByuN, play incredibly greedy games. value.title: How quickly can REYNOR dispose of noobs? (Part 2) | Holdout Challenge - StarCraft 2

The challenge: the noobs needed to stay in the match for as long as possible. How did they fare against an actual Zerg Championship player?
